name: MEKTOVI 15 MG
treatmentDescriptions: BRAF V600E or V600K Mutation-Positive Unresectable or Metastatic MelanomaBinimetinib is a kinase inhibitor indicated, in combination with encorafenib, for the treatment of adult patients with unresectable or metastatic melanoma with a BRAF V600E or V600K mutation.BRAF V600E Mutation-Positive metastatic non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC)Binimetinib is a kinase inhibitor indicated, in combination with encorafenib, for the treatment of adult patients with metastatic non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC) adenocarcinoma with a BRAF V600E mutation, as detected by an approved test.
warnings: תרופה מוגבלת לרישום ע'י רופא מומחה או הגבלה אחרת
